name: Bouncy Bounce
description: Mario landing causes him to jump.

events.onPlayerLanding: function (mod) { var player = this.player; if (player.FSM.MapScreener.nokeys || Math.abs(player.yvel) < player.FSM.unitsize / 4) { return; } if (player.resting.actionTop) { player.resting.actionTop(player, player.resting); } player.jumpcount = 0; player.resting = undefined; player.yvel = -3 * player.FSM.unitsize; }
events.onPlayerActionLeft: function (mod, player, other) { other.actionLeft(player, other, true); }
